remarks: Property of being a homomorphism of left modules.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
islmhm.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
islmhm.l $e |- L = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
islmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islmhm.e $e |- E = ( Base ` S ) $.
islmhm.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) $.
islmhm.n $e |- .X. = ( .s ` T ) $.
islmhm $p |- ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) <-> ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) /\ ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) /\ L = K /\ A. x e. B A. y e. E ( F ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( x .X. ( F ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d E y $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x y $.
